creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: blues, pinks; ten individual streamers attached to a wide blue waistband that ties with a cord; eight streamers have blue print cloth, two plain pink; blue streamers end with three large, stiff embroidered cutouts; pink streamers have more elaborate cutouts including some metal discs; all streamer cutouts are figures and/or floral designs joined with metal beads edged with thin braid--some end in tassels; one metal bell (?) on one tassel
title: Streamer Skirt
